Package primitive_variable_conversion
[transport]

Module containing routines for converting mass to concentraion, and concentration to mass. More...


Functions/Subroutines

subroutine cons2prim (conc, mass, area, nloc, nvar)
 Convert conservative variables (ie mass) to primitive (concentration) There is no precaution against divide by zero, so if you put in zero for area you will get NaN.
subroutine prim2cons (mass, conc, area, nloc, nvar)
 Convert primitive (concentration) to conservative variables (ie mass).
subroutine prim_increment_to_cons (mass, conc, area, nloc, nvar, scale)
 Increment a conservative variable using an increment (e.g. source) in primitive terms Converts increment of primitive (concentration) to conservative variable (mass) and adds it to the conservative variable. "Scale" will typically involve dt or half*dt.

Detailed Description

Module containing routines for converting mass to concentraion, and concentration to mass.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine primitive_variable_conversion.cons2prim ( real(stm_real),dimension(nloc,nvar),intent(out)  conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(nloc,nvar),intent(in)  mass,
real(stm_real),dimension(nloc),intent(in)  area,
integer,intent(in)  nloc,
integer,intent(in)  nvar 
)

Convert conservative variables (ie mass) to primitive (concentration) There is no precaution against divide by zero, so if you put in zero for area you will get NaN.

Parameters:
conc Concentration (converted from mass per unit length )
mass Mass per unit length
area Area at conversion locations
nloc Number of cells or faces
nvar Number of variables

subroutine primitive_variable_conversion.prim2cons ( real(stm_real),dimension(nloc,nvar),intent(out)  mass,
real(stm_real),dimension(nloc,nvar),intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(nloc),intent(in)  area,
integer,intent(in)  nloc,
integer,intent(in)  nvar 
)

Convert primitive (concentration) to conservative variables (ie mass).

Parameters:
mass Mass per unit length (converted from concentration)
conc Concentrations to convert
area Area at conversion locations
nloc Number of cells or faces
nvar Number of variables

subroutine primitive_variable_conversion.prim_increment_to_cons ( real(stm_real),dimension(nloc,nvar),intent(inout)  mass,
real(stm_real),dimension(nloc,nvar),intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(nloc),intent(in)  area,
integer,intent(in)  nloc,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  scale 
)

Increment a conservative variable using an increment (e.g. source) in primitive terms Converts increment of primitive (concentration) to conservative variable (mass) and adds it to the conservative variable. "Scale" will typically involve dt or half*dt.

Parameters:
mass Mass per unit length (converted from concentration)
conc Concentrations to convert
area Area at conversion locations
nloc Number of cells or faces
nvar Number of variables
scale Scale factor
